name: Cherubimon_(Good)
description: Cherubimon (Good) is an Angel Digimon. As one of the " Celestial Digimon ", it is the guardian of God and its wisdom.  It has the appearance of a beast, and uses mighty lightning techniques, whose strike is thought to be divine punishment. Angel Digimon, which are positioned at the ultimate "Virtue", have the aspect of their being easily stained by its antithesis of "Vice" as a consequence of their extremity.
